summary.description: As an experienced IT Business Analyst, I have spent the last 4 years working with both product companies and outsourcing firms, honing my skills in project management, requirements gathering, and stakeholder communication. However, what truly sets me apart is my passion for UX/UI design and my strong background in software and data. I am constantly seeking new ways to enhance user experiences and streamline processes through innovative design and data-driven insights. With my diverse skill set and passion for technology, I am confident in my ability to make a significant contribution to any organization.

experience.description:
I improved my mindset and technical knowledge a lot when working at my present company. There were various challenges when working on outsourcing projects for client came from abroad. At last, I found myself really like this job and ready for new challenges
- Gather requirements
- Communicate and validate requirements with stakeholders
- Write User Story, Use Case, FSD, SRS
- Analyze Data and writing query script.
- Coordinate with different teams to ensure the quality of outcomes 
- Plan and Organize schedule to ensure launch on time along the Project roadmap
- Support in testing, verifying bugs or issues with client

The first company I had joined immediately after graduation from university. I really appreciate for experiences given from this first job. I improved a lot of a BA’s main skills through doing projects such as communicate with stakeholders, writing documents, working directedly with the system and so on.
- Gather requirements from stakeholders and write down feature list.
- Communicate and validate requirements with stakeholders.
- Write Business Requirement Document, Project Vision Document, User guide
- Senerios Testing
- Onsite and analyze process issues to make improvements through digital transformation
- Coordinate with different teams to ensure the quality of outcomes
- Plan and organize

The part time job when I was a student at university. I learned a huge knowledge about digital marketing through working with my team leader, my knowledge I was learned mainly focus on SEO. I also learned the organizing and planning skills, team working and creative thinking
- Working as Designer
- Edit marketing videos 
- Conduct SEO campaign
- Write content for SEO campaign.

project.project_description: Connecting data from manufactory system to vehicle weighing software

Connecting data from other system to accounting system that support to manage accounting, 
warehouse, and human resource for Da Nang port
ERP system designed for help ware house and purchasing management
Maintain and enhancement Customer Relationship Management System.

Developing Customer Service Portal for insurance term designed for helps internal staff and third party 
staff promptly support customer.
Data migration by using SQL query statements to mapping data from old system to new system based on requirements.
Maintain and enhance the internal system of a bank designed for helping the marketing department rapidly run a new marketing campaign by refund for customers who use bank’s service.

Writing current state analysis document and transfer to team

Working with developer to hotfix bugs

Plan and organize roadmap of project
Write business requirement document include current state analysis, business requirement solution
Work closely with Dev and tester to keep tracking project ensure launch on time
Scenrios test and write user guide
Implementing the accounting and ERP system standard version and support client for using in person, also gather change request

Write Business requirement documents
Communicate with PO and client to clearly understand business process and provide solution to enhancement
Writing User Story, FSD
Design Wireframe, prototype for new screens
